_instructions.api_key: Put your API key directly here (NOT recommended for security), OR leave empty to use api_key_env
_instructions.api_key_env: Environment variable name to read API key from (recommended). If both are empty, model is skipped.
_instructions.provider: Must be one of: openai, anthropic, google
_instructions.model_id: The exact model identifier from the provider
_instructions.cost_per_1m_tokens: Cost per 1 million tokens - check provider pricing pages
_instructions.max_tokens: Maximum output tokens per request (100 is usually enough for MATCH/NO_MATCH)
_instructions.how_to_add_models: Copy any model block, change the values, and it will be automatically tested

_security_note: For production use, always use environment variables (api_key_env) instead of hardcoding API keys in this file
